articles.title: Hotels in Malaysia and around the region focus on other things amid pandemic - The Star Online
articles.description: For many hotels in South-East Asia, the Covid-19 pandemic gives them an opportunity to work on ramping up their sustainability development programmes and conservation projects.
articles.content:
